title: Simulation-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Engineering Students' Mathematical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and foundational engineering theories (understanding of circuit elements)
context.additional_context: Customized education for pre-service/in-service teachers to improve engineering mathematics application skills, providing practical learning environments through smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Achieve at least 80% proficiency in modeling and solving differential equations for engineering problem-solving
Improve accuracy in complex number operations and matrix analysis for circuit theory applications by 75%
Complete a project applying mathematical approaches to real-world engineering problems using simulation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
